metadata.name: AWL Bypass with Winrm.vbs and Malicious WsmPty.xsl/WsmTxt.xsl
metadata.comment: Detects execution of attacker-controlled WsmPty.xsl or WsmTxt.xsl via winrm.vbs and copied cscript.exe (can be renamed)

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('winrm')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('format:pretty')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('format:"pretty"')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('format:"text"')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('format:text'))) AND NOT (startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\windows\\system32\\')) OR startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\windows\\syswow64\\'))))

output.summary: Detects execution of attacker-controlled WsmPty.xsl or WsmTxt.xsl via winrm.vbs and copied cscript.exe (can be renamed)
